div.a: How Disasters Change Marriage, Divorce, And Birth Rates

div.div: The physical disruption of Hurricane Sandy is overwhelming, but it can be measured: tens of billions of dollars in damage, lost income, and interrupted business. The human costs are harder to measure, but we can predict some of Sandy’s likely impact by examining the effects of disasters on marriage, divorce, and birth.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UuyNj3&via=Digg&text=How Disasters Change Marriage, Divorce, And Birth Rates

div.a: How I Hacked An Electronic Voting Machine

div.div: What do you need to rig an election? A basic knowledge of electronics and $30 worth of RadioShack gear, professional hacker Roger Johnston reveals. The good news: we can stop it.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Yw6C8o&via=Digg&text=How I Hacked An Electronic Voting Machine

div.a: 800K #Sandy-Grams Proves Instagram Is “Going To Need To Be A Big Data Company”

div.div: 800,000 Instagrams were tagged [Hurricane] #Sandy, and Instagram co-founder Kevin Systrom thinks that makes it the most digitally captured event in history. So how is the company going to make sense of all that data?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Xe1vLb&via=Digg&text=800K #Sandy-Grams Proves Instagram Is “Going To Need To Be A Big Data Company”

div.a: Not Voting Tomorrow? Your Excuse Sucks

div.div: 'Do you know what pour-over coffee is? If so, you definitely have time to #vote.' yourexcusesucks.com/

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PyWY2L&via=Digg&text=Not Voting Tomorrow? Your Excuse Sucks

div.div: The anonymous author is 29, a professional poker player, and one of the most active traders on the real-money prediction website. He's got six figures at risk this cycle.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YKKd6t&via=Digg&text=Gambling On Politics (Literally)

div.a: World's Rarest Whale Seen For First Time

div.div: The world's rarest whale has been spotted for the first time, in New Zealand, where two of the whales stranded themselves.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PyjY1K&via=Digg&text=World's Rarest Whale Seen For First Time

div.div: Tomorrow voters in three states will decide whether to legalize marijuana. This writer claims the economic, social and moral imperatives for ending pot prohibition go far beyond freedom to get high.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SrINcY&via=Digg&text=The Case For Legalizing Pot

div.a: The Best Photos Of The Entire Presidential Campaign

div.div: Presidential campaigns are about policies, interest groups, slogans, personalties, and, to the chagrin of very serious people, images. But there were some amazing photos taken during the 2012 election, so here are the best of them.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UukUBq&via=Digg&text=The Best Photos Of The Entire Presidential Campaign

div.div: An English racing team called the Bloodhound Project is a step closer to breaking the land-speed record—and not by a small margin.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RKVGht&via=Digg&text=Breaking The 1,000 MPH Land-Speed Barrier

div.a: 25 Photos Of Glamorous Musicians Doing Regular Stuff

div.div: As anyone who’s spent any time with musicians can attest, they’re often not the most practical types. (Nor, for that matter, are most artistically-inclined folk.) But every once in a while, everyone has to cook an egg.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SPcWUt&via=Digg&text=25 Photos Of Glamorous Musicians Doing Regular Stuff

div.div: When you log in to Facebook on Election Day you will likely be greeted by a note reminding you of your civic duty.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SnakMr&via=Digg&text=Facebook Wants You... To Vote

div.a: 'Mega-Rate' Atari Game Sells For More Than $33,000

div.div: A copy of Air Raid, which is regarded as the rarest Atari 2600 game, sold for $33,433.30 on video game auction site GameGavel yesterday.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SsXAnM&via=Digg&text='Mega-Rate' Atari Game Sells For More Than $33,000

div.a: The Voter Guide For Your Ladyparts

div.div: Eleven reasons why every woman should vote on Tuesday.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U4NYiy&via=Digg&text=The Voter Guide For Your Ladyparts

div.a: Abandoned Suitcases Reveal Private Lives Of Insane Asylum Patients

div.div: If you were committed to a psychiatric institution, unsure if you’d ever return to the life you knew before, what would you take with you? That sobering question hovers like an apparition over each of the Willard Asylum suitcases.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Udtxpz&via=Digg&text=Abandoned Suitcases Reveal Private Lives Of Insane Asylum Patients

div.a: Watch A Small Plane Plow Into An SUV Before Landing Safely

div.div: In an exceptional feat of controlling a flying machine, a pilot somehow manages to land a small plane after it strikes an SUV that happened to cross the runway.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Pyt7r9&via=Digg&text=Watch A Small Plane Plow Into An SUV Before Landing Safely

div.div: With the release of Surface, Microsoft is taking a serious dive into the wide world of hardware production. But this isn't the first time Microsoft has gone down that road. In fact, Redmond has racked up a pretty impressive catalogue of devices. Here's a list of all of them.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YwYyob&via=Digg&text=Every Single Microsoft Device. Ever.

div.div: NOT IF THE DONALD CAN HELP IT

div.a: Have Obama Conspiracy Theories Lost Traction?

div.div: For whatever reason, there has been a real slump in the number of people typing “obama gun”, “obama muslim”, “obama socialist”, and “obama citizen” into the Google search box since the 2008 election.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TsPXwu&via=Digg&text=Have Obama Conspiracy Theories Lost Traction?

div.div: Astronomer Neil deGrasse Tyson helped DC Comics, home of the Superman comics, find a plausible star to be the host of the superhero's home planet, Krypton.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VuIdke&via=Digg&text=Superman's Home Planet Krypton 'Found'

div.a: How Astronauts Cast Ballots From Space

div.div: Call it the ultimate absentee ballot. NASA astronauts aboard the International Space Station have the option of voting in tomorrow's presidential election from orbit, hundreds of miles above their nearest polling location.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RMGwID&via=Digg&text=How Astronauts Cast Ballots From Space

div.div: IT WILL MAKI YOU SMELL GOOD

div.a: Sushi Cologne Is Apparently A Real Thing

div.div: On paper, food colognes should make a lot of sense. Food smells good. Perfumes and colognes also smell good.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Wr5ZPx&via=Digg&text=Sushi Cologne Is Apparently A Real Thing

div.a: DNA Hacking Is Now Street Legal

div.div: The world's first mass-market gene therapy has been legalized in Europe. Glybera, which treats a painful disorder that leads to pancreatitis, will be available in hospitals beginning next year.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U4Ltg8&via=Digg&text=DNA Hacking Is Now Street Legal

div.a: How Long Does It Take Beer To Explode In The Freezer?

div.div: Freezer beer explosions are dreaded, hated, notorious, infamous. Not only is the contents of your freezer showered with fresh yeast water and glass, your beer supply is destroyed.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TENxiD&via=Digg&text=How Long Does It Take Beer To Explode In The Freezer?

div.a: Oliver Stone Talks Politics, Weed, And The Potential Petraeus Coup

div.div: "The ground rules? I told him I’d publish as much as I could, with the understanding we would likely take the most inflammatory thing he said and make a headline of it, and it’d probably be interpreted wildly out of context elsewhere in the media. He agreed."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RJfu4P&via=Digg&text=Oliver Stone Talks Politics, Weed, And The Potential Petraeus Coup

div.a: The People Who Were Killed By Hurricane Sandy

div.div: Whitney Hess wasn't able to find a single news source that has aggregated the names, stories, and causes of death of every person killed by Hurricane Sandy. So she made her own.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XdFbBe&via=Digg&text=The People Who Were Killed By Hurricane Sandy

div.a: Physicists Build Laser Tweezers Controlled With Kinect

div.div: Now anybody can pick up and move micrometre-scale particles using their hands and arms thanks to a Kinect-controlled device called HoloHands.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TEOqHZ&via=Digg&text=Physicists Build Laser Tweezers Controlled With Kinect

div.div: NO, WE DON'T KNOW WHO WILL WIN

div.a: 8 Questions About The Presidential Election Answered

div.div: Confused about the difference between the Electoral College and the popular vote? Here's what you need to know to fake it through election night.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PxMFf8&via=Digg&text=8 Questions About The Presidential Election Answered

div.a: Phish Frontman Hoists Heavy Things, Helps Hood Where Sandy Waves Swept Away Possessions

div.div: Outside the flooded 158-year-old Visitation of the Blessed Virgin Mary Church, volunteers distributed blankets, food, and clothing to beleaguered hurricane victims, who received a little extra help from Phish frontman Trey Anastasio.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VtStJs&via=Digg&text=Phish Frontman Hoists Heavy Things, Helps Hood Where Sandy Waves Swept Away Possessions

div.a: Is Yogurt Really Good For You?

div.div: Yogurt manufacturers have long marketed the "live, active cultures" in their products, but is any of it really good for you?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SqHvPD&via=Digg&text=Is Yogurt Really Good For You?

div.a: Why The Microsoft Store Isn't Like The Apple Store

div.div: It's easy to think that Microsoft stores are mere copies of Apple stores. But a visit to a newly-opened store shows that there are differences. You just have to be open to them.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PwJft2&via=Digg&text=Why The Microsoft Store Isn't Like The Apple Store

div.a: Next Time You Have Sex In Front Of A Webcam, Make Sure It's Turned Off

div.div: A World Of Warcraft player accidentally livestreamed himself "questing" with a lady friend.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TEMSOc&via=Digg&text=Next Time You Have Sex In Front Of A Webcam, Make Sure It's Turned Off
